Text: Anyone know if it works yet?

This was released on another site and was said to be working. I usually choose torrents because they are faster, but I was getting over 3MB/s with JDownloader. Then it said I was over my limit, so I had to wait a while and whatnot, and then later it finally started going again at 100kb/s. Would have tried TBP in the first place but it was being really slow. At an average of 800 kb/s which is great because it should stay that way. Gonna be about 2 hours to finish. Then I'll let you all know how it is. There are 92 seeders so obviously people are supporting it. Anyways, seems like a small file, only 6GB compared to usual 7.5 or so, but then again, the first one was probably really small considering it was just one of a few games on The Orange Box.
Does this work without ap 2.5

Finished in about 2 1/2 hours I think. I don't remember exactly what my speeds were but I think I had like 1.5 or 2 MB/s. 

Thanks for the seeders, and we already went up 40 seeders since I started downloading. I'm seeding right now, and I'll let you know how it works, since no one else wants to comment. 

As for the above user, probably does not work without AP 2.5. Just update to the latest iXtreme.

The game works perfect thanks!
